verses.roman:
eka-dina prabhu gelā jagannātha-daraśane
siṁha-dvāre dala-i āsi' karila vandane

synonyms: eka-dina—one day; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; gelā—went; jagannātha-daraśane—to see Lord Jagannātha; siṁha-dvāre—at the gate known as Siṁha-dvāra; dala-i—the gatekeeper; āsi'-coming; karila vandane—offered respectful obeisances.
translation: One day, when Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu went to visit the temple of Lord Jagannātha, the gatekeeper at Siṁha-dvāra approached Him and offered respectful obeisances.
